original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Issachar was Nethanel the son of Zuar.
korean_text: 잇사갈 자손 지파의 군대는 수알의 아들 느다넬이 이끌었고

sentences.original_text: And over the company of the tribe of the people of Issachar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 잇사갈 지파 사람들의 부대 장관은

sentences.original_text: was Nethanel the son of Zuar.
